title: People of the Peace
creator_credit: Julian Biggs, David Bairstow and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A summary and analysis of the Peace River district showing the economic factors necessary for an integrated and prosperous development. It is a warm and human story of change from primitive sod-busting to modern, mechanized agriculture and industry, and a tribute to the pioneer spirit which still finds scope in our northern settlement fringe.
